segments.text: The woman seems so focused on drying that plate, unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water overflowing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being quite mischievous, trying to get those cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it's going to tip over any second, and the boy is going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit nervous watching the boy balance like that, it's dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so cute and innocent, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice the mess and the children's mischief before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so serene and well-kept, unlike the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to fall and hurt himself if he's not more careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around and sees what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is making me feel quite anxious and worried.
segments.speaker: PAR
